p: The addition of PbO to turmeric powder at 1 and 0.5% (m/m), crude essential oil, and ar-turmerone at 1% (m/m) caused synergism by increasing the predatory spined soldier bug nymph and adult mortality. Minimum or zero synergism on mortality was observed for all insecticides tested in combination with PbO on the fourth and fifth instars and adult predatory spined soldier bug ( Figure 1).
